author: Patti Domm
title: Stocks got two positives Monday - drug industry breakthroughs and a more realistic government approach
description: President Trump's extension of virus guidelines to April 30, and several promising medical developments calmed some angst in markets.
content:
President Donald Trump's decision to keep coronavirus safety guidelines in place until April 30, coupled with some promising developments from health companies, has helped calm some of the angst in the stock market, for now. 
Stocks were up about 2% Monday m… [+6656 chars]
